name: id
type: Type: String (cast from an integer, but not guaranteed to be a number)
description: Description: The ID of the announcement in the database.

name: content
description: Description: The text of the announcement.

name: starts_at
type: Type: NULLABLE String (ISO 8601 Datetime) or null
description: Description: When the announcement will start.

name: ends_at
type: Type: NULLABLE String (ISO 8601 Datetime) or null
description: Description: When the announcement will end.

name: published
description: Description: Whether the announcement is currently active.

name: all_day
description: Description: Whether the announcement should start and end on dates only instead of datetimes. Will be false if there is no starts_at or ends_at time.

name: published_at
description: Description: When the announcement was published.

name: updated_at
description: Description: When the announcement was last updated.

name: read OPTIONAL
description: Description: Whether the announcement has been read by the current user.

name: mentions
description: Description: Accounts mentioned in the announcement text.

name: statuses
description: Description: Statuses linked in the announcement text.

name: tags
description: Description: Tags linked in the announcement text.

name: emojis
description: Description: Custom emoji used in the announcement text.

name: reactions
description: Description: Emoji reactions attached to the announcement.
